captions.text:
Dani, Elidio and Arijon will
play "Quick Change". Stand up.

Give me a game. If you
played some game lately...

'Minecraft'! So, it will have
to be about mining.

"Quick Change" works like this,
they will improvise a scene,

and whenever I say 'change', they'll change
the last thing they have said or done.

I say 'change', they change.
'Mining', "Quick Change", go!

Seriously, man! They said
there's still gold in here!

- But I thought this mine was
abandoned! - It is abandoned!

- What if the gold has abandoned the mine?
- Don't be an idiot!

- The miners believed that a
guy died in here... - Change!

A girl died in here... A girl dies in
a drilling... They saw it as a sign...

- Do you get it?
- I got it!

- That's bullshit!
- Change!

- That's nonsense!
- Change!

I believe in it too!
But gold is precious!
Come here.

- Look, it's shining.
- Change!

- Look, it's shining.
- Change!

- Look, it's shining. It's the flashlight, see?
- It's my forehead!
Shit...
Turn off this forehead, man!
Someone could see it!

- Holy crap!
- Change!

- Oh-la-la!
- Change!

- Wow!
- Change!

- Geez!
- Change!

- Damn!
- Change!

- Woooo...
- Change!

- My God! - This is the
dead girl, it's real, man!

- The girl! - Wait...
She's on decomposition...

- She didn't decompose...
I mean... - Change!

- Thanks! She's unspoiled!
- Change!

My God, there's only
the skeleton left! Look...

- Instead of eyes, she has
gold nuggets! - Change!

- Instead of a nose, she has
gold nuggets... - Change!

- Instead of breasts, she has
gold nuggets... - Change!

Instead of a hypophysis,
she has gold nuggets...
Look...

- Did you see that?
- Man, that was a reflex from the hypophysis!

- Look at the size of this nugget!
- Change!

- Look at the longitude of this nugget!
- Change!

- Look at the latitude of this nugget!
- Change!

Look at the tridimensionality
of this nugget!

Man, this nugget could be responsible
for the skeleton's hormones!

Wait, do you think the skeleton will
rise if we put on the nugget again?
No, I didn't say that!

- I just said I think it's responsible
for the hormones! - Change!

- I just said I think she likes this
nugget very much! - Change!
Of course she'll come back to life!

- I doubt that!
- No, don't do it!
Change!
It's Xuxa's skeleton!

- Oh, God... - It's one of the best
investments we did on this show!
Applause for Daniel Tauszig!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.
Holy water... It's working!
This is Brazil!
